content: Stalin's Summer Residence, also known as Stalin's Dacha, is definitely a must-visit attraction in Sochi. The residence features an impressive Neo-Classical architecture with beautiful gardens and a personal cinema inside. You can also see Stalin's bedroom and study, which have been preserved in their original state. It's a unique opportunity to delve deeper into Soviet history, and I'm sure you'll find it interesting. Have a great time in Sochi!
